title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1200.5.5 - Unauthorized practice of law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1200.5.5 - Unauthorized practice of law

State Regulations
(a) A lawyer shall not practice law in
a jurisdiction in violation of the regulation of the legal profession in that
jurisdiction. (b) A
lawyer shall not aid a nonlawyer in the unauthorized practice of law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1200.5.5. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
